00051 bool FilePtr::map( int file, size_t len, bool write, const boost::filesystem::path &filename )
00052 {
00053     const int flags = write ? MAP_SHARED : MAP_PRIVATE;
00054 
00055     void *const ptr = mmap( 0, len, PROT_WRITE | PROT_READ, flags , file, 0 ); // yes we say PROT_WRITE here also if the file is opened ro - its for the mapping, not for the file
00056 
00057     if( ptr == MAP_FAILED ) {
00058         LOG( Debug, error ) << "Failed to map file, error was " << strerror( errno );
00059         return false;
00060     } else {
00061         const Closer cl = {file, len, filename};
00062         static_cast<ValuePtr<uint8_t>&>( *this ) = ValuePtr<uint8_t>( static_cast<uint8_t * const>( ptr ), len, cl );
00063         return true;
00064     }
00065 }

00067 size_t FilePtr::checkSize( bool write, int file, const boost::filesystem::path &filename, size_t size )
00068 {
00069     const boost::uintmax_t currSize = boost::filesystem::file_size( filename );
00070 
00071     if( write ) { // if we're writing
00072         assert( size > 0 );
00073 
00074         if( size > currSize ) { // and the file is shorter than requested, resize it
00075             const int err = ftruncate( file, size ) ? errno : 0;
00076 
00077             if( err ) { // could not resize the file => fail
00078                 LOG( Runtime, error )
00079                         << "Failed to resize " << util::MSubject( filename )
00080                         << " to the requested size " << size << ", the error was: " << util::MSubject( strerror( err ) );
00081                 return 0; // fail
00082             } else
00083                 return size; // ok now the file has the right size
00084         } else
00085             return size; // no resizing needed
00086     } else { // if we're reading
00087         if( size == 0 ) {
00088             if ( std::numeric_limits<size_t>::max() < currSize ) {
00089                 LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Sorry cannot map files larger than " << std::numeric_limits<size_t>::max()
00090                                       << " bytes on this platform";
00091                 return 0;
00092             } else
00093                 return currSize; // automatically select size of the file
00094         } else if( size <= currSize )
00095             return size; // keep the requested size (will fit into the file)
00096         else { // size will not fit into the file (and we cannot resize) => fail
00097             LOG( Runtime, error ) << "The requested size for readonly mapping of " << util::MSubject( filename )
00098                                   << " is greater than the filesize (" << currSize << ").";
00099             return 0; // fail
00100         }
00101     }
00102 }

00105 FilePtr::FilePtr( const boost::filesystem::path &filename, size_t len, bool write ): m_good( false )
00106 {
00107     const int oflag = write ?
00108                       O_CREAT | O_RDWR : //create file if its not there
00109                       O_RDONLY; //open file readonly
00110     const int file = open( filename.file_string().c_str(), oflag, S_IRUSR | S_IWUSR );
00111 
00112     if( file == -1 ) {
00113         LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Failed to open " << util::MSubject( filename )
00114                               << ", the error was: " << util::MSubject( strerror( errno ) );
00115         return;
00116     }
00117 
00118     const size_t map_size = checkSize( write, file, filename, len ); // get the mapping size
00119 
00120     if( map_size )
00121         m_good = map( file, map_size, write, filename ); //and do the mapping
00122 
00123     // from here on the pointer will be set if mapping succeded
00124 }
